entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the morning. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then west 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
